What to say when entering the home.ARABIC_TEXT: (بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا، ثُمَّ لِيُسَلِّمْ عَلَى أَهْلِهِ).
What to say when entering the home.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Bismil-lahi walajna, wabismil-lahi kharajna, waAAala rabbina tawakkalna.)
What to say when entering the home.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.)
